record.field: Dear ${approver_name}. Based on leave request ${name}. You have approval pending that needs your decision to approve or reject this leave request from ${employee_name}. ${employee_name} has requested leave for ${leave_name} from ${start_date} to ${end_date}. You can review by clicking this link: ${url}.

Dear ${employee_name}. We have received your request for your Leave for ${leave_name} from ${start_date} to ${end_date}. This notification confirms that your request for your Leave has been approved. We will look forward to seeing you again when you return.

Dear ${employee_name}. We have received your request for your Leave for ${leave_name} from ${start_date} to ${end_date}. This notification confirms that your request for your Leave has been rejected. We apologize for this decision.

Dear ${approver_name}. Based on leave cancellation ${name}. You have approval pending that needs your decision to approve or reject this leave cancellation from ${employee_name}. ${employee_name} has requested leave cancellation for ${leave_name} from ${start_date} to ${end_date}. You can review by clicking this link: ${url}.

Dear ${employee_name}. We have received your request for your Leave Cancellation for ${leave_name} from ${start_date} to ${end_date}. This notification serves as a confirmation that your Leave Cancellation has been approved.

Dear ${employee_name}. We have received your request for your Leave Cancellation for ${leave_name} from ${start_date} to ${end_date}. This notification serves as a confirmation that your Leave Cancellation has been rejected.

Dear ${approver_name}. Based on Allocation Request ${name}. We need your decision to approve or reject this Allocation Request from ${employee_name}. ${employee_name} has requested Allocation Request for (s)he leaves allocation for ${leave_name} for ${duration}. You can review to approve or reject the request by clicking on this link: ${url}.
Dear ${employee_name}. We have received your request for your Allocation Request for ${leave_name}. This notification serves as a confirmation that your Allocation Request has been approved.
Dear ${employee_name}. We have received your request for your Allocation Request for ${leave_name}. This notification serves as a confirmation that your Allocation Request has been rejected.
